name: ERC20Factory
description: MinimalProxy Factory. Refer to https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1167 for details. The Factory contract creates Minimal Proxies using EIP1167,which point to ERC20 contracts implementation, this saving on gas.

eventDecorators.name: ERC20Created
eventDecorators.description: Event will be emitted every time a new ERC20 MinimalProxy is created.

parameterDecorators.name: newERC20Address
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the newly created ERC20 token MinimalProxy.

functionDecorators.name: createERC20
functionDecorators.description: Creates and initializes the ERC20 MinimalProxy contract.

parameterDecorators.name: libraryAddress_
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of implementation, to which the MinimalProxy should point to.

parameterDecorators.name: name_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token name.

parameterDecorators.name: symbol_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token symbol.

parameterDecorators.name: totalSupply_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token totalSupply that will be minted to msg.sender.

functionDecorators.name: createERC20WithReferral
functionDecorators.description: Creates and initializes the ERC20 MinimalProxy contract.

parameterDecorators.name: libraryAddress_
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of implementation, to which the MinimalProxy should point to.

parameterDecorators.name: name_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token name.

parameterDecorators.name: symbol_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token symbol.

parameterDecorators.name: totalSupply_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token totalSupply that will be minted to msg.sender.

parameterDecorators.name: referral_
parameterDecorators.description: is the referral, who will receive 0.01 ETH from the deployment.

functionDecorators.name: createERC20WithReferralSigned
functionDecorators.description: Creates and initializes the ERC20 MinimalProxy contract using a referral link and signatures.

parameterDecorators.name: libraryAddress_
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of implementation, to which the MinimalProxy should point to.

parameterDecorators.name: name_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token name.

parameterDecorators.name: symbol_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token symbol.

parameterDecorators.name: totalSupply_
parameterDecorators.description: is the ERC20 token totalSupply that will be minted to msg.sender.

parameterDecorators.name: referral_
parameterDecorators.description: is the referral, who will receive 0.01 ETH from the deployment.

parameterDecorators.name: v_
parameterDecorators.description: A final byte of signature (ECDSA component).

parameterDecorators.name: r_
parameterDecorators.description: The first 32 bytes of signature (ECDSA component).

parameterDecorators.name: s_
parameterDecorators.description: The second 32 bytes of signature (ECDSA component).

functionDecorators.name: isClone
functionDecorators.description: Tests if MinimalProxy instance really points to the correct implementation.

parameterDecorators.name: target
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of implementation, to which the MinimalProxy should point to.

parameterDecorators.name: query
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of MinimalProxy that needs to be tested.

returnDecorators.name: result
returnDecorators.description: is true if MinimalProxy really points to the implementation address.

functionDecorators.name: payout
functionDecorators.description: Pays out all Factory ETH balance to owners address.

functionDecorators.name: payoutToken
functionDecorators.description: Pays out all Factory ERC20 token balance to owners address.

parameterDecorators.name: _tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: is an address of the ERC20 token to payout.

functionDecorators.name: setRequireSigned
functionDecorators.description: Restricts referral creation to be signed by the service.

parameterDecorators.name: requireSigned_
parameterDecorators.description: true if signature is required.
